Element.name: DataServices
Element.Description: The data service contains all classes exposed through REST Data Services.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The source database for Data Services.
The source database schema for Data Services.
If set, all the names of tables exported by the Database Synchronizer operation are prefixed with the specified value.
If set, determines for each defined Role in the project, the operations exposed as data service for the selected Class of the Domain Model.
Defines the general caching option for Read services requests. This option can be tailored for each published service by changing the same property on the corresponding published class.
